text: eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Eṅkaḷiruvaraiyum uṉakku (muṟṟilum) vaḻippaṭum muslimkaḷākavum, eṅkaḷ cantatiyiliruntum oru kūṭṭattiṉarai uṉakku (muṟṟilum) vaḻippaṭum muslimkaḷākavum ākkivaippāyāka! (‘Hajjū' kālattil) nāṅkaḷ puriyavēṇṭiya vaṇakkaṅkaḷai eṅkaḷukku aṟivippāyāka! (Nāṅkaḷ tavaṟiḻaittu viṭṭālum) eṅkaḷai nī maṉṉippāyāka! Niccayamāka nītāṉ mika maṉṉippavaṉ, mikka karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉ
